CustomField.description: This field is used to dynamically display or hide e.g. related list components on the Lightning Record Page - esp. the "Child Work Order" vs. "Child Work Orders of Parent Work Order" list in order to prevent the creation of "Grand Children" Work Orders on a Work Order that already has a parent Record. The lighting component can only be filtered with boolean values, hence the requirement for the field.
CustomField.label: Is Root Work Order
